00011 global data_type
00012 
00013 %V1 = map_smooth(sensor,V1,sensor.calc_sensitivity.mask);
00014 %V2 = map_smooth(sensor,V2,sensor.calc_sensitivity.mask);
00015 
00016 [Ex1 Ey1] = gradient(V1,1);
00017 [Ex2 Ey2] = gradient(V2,1);
00018 
00019 [Ex1_ Ey1_] = gradient(V1,2);
00020 [Ex2_ Ey2_] = gradient(V2,2);
00021 
00022 th=6.5;
00023 [p] = find(abs(Ex1)>th);
00024 Ex1(p) = Ex1_(p);
00025 Ey1(p) = Ey1_(p);
00026 [p] = find(abs(Ey1)>th);
00027 Ex1(p) = Ex1_(p);
00028 Ey1(p) = Ey1_(p);
00029 [p] = find(abs(Ex2)>th);
00030 Ex2(p) = Ex2_(p);
00031 Ey2(p) = Ey2_(p);
00032 [p] = find(abs(Ey2)>th);
00033 Ex2(p) = Ex2_(p);
00034 Ey2(p) = Ey2_(p);
00035 
00036 th=6.5;
00037 [p] = find(abs(Ex1)<-th);
00038 Ex1(p) = Ex1_(p);
00039 Ey1(p) = Ey1_(p);
00040 [p] = find(abs(Ey1)<-th);
00041 Ex1(p) = Ex1_(p);
00042 Ey1(p) = Ey1_(p);
00043 [p] = find(abs(Ex2)<-th);
00044 Ex2(p) = Ex2_(p);
00045 Ey2(p) = Ey2_(p);
00046 [p] = find(abs(Ey2)<-th);
00047 Ex2(p) = Ex2_(p);
00048 Ey2(p) = Ey2_(p);
00049 
00050 
00051 % th=10;
00052 % [Ex1__ Ey1__] = gradient(V1,3);
00053 % [Ex2__ Ey2__] = gradient(V2,3);
00054 % [p] = find(abs(Ex1)>th);
00055 % Ex1(p) = Ex1__(p);
00056 % Ey1(p) = Ey1__(p);
00057 % [p] = find(abs(Ey1)>th);
00058 % Ex1(p) = Ex1__(p);
00059 % Ey1(p) = Ey1_(p);
00060 % [p] = find(abs(Ex2)>th);

00064 % Ex2(p) = Ex2__(p);
00065 % Ey2(p) = Ey2__(p);

00067 
00068 S = - (Ex1.*Ex2 + Ey1.*Ey2);

00122 %         ey1 = -(V1(i+1,j)-V1(i-1,j))/2;

00124 %         ey2 = -(V2(i+1,j)-V2(i-1,j))/2;
